trans-unit.source: Allows an instrumented class, or member of an instrumented class, to present an alternate name through management instrumentation.
trans-unit.target: 可讓已檢測的類別或成員的已檢測的類別，提供透過管理檢測的替代名稱。

trans-unit.source: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ WMI.NET 程式庫目前被認為在最終狀態，而且沒有進一步開發之用，增強功能，或更新可供非安全性相關問題會影響這些程式庫。

trans-unit.source: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagedNameAttribute"></xref> class that allows the alternate name to be specified for the type, field, property, method, or parameter to which this attribute is applied.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagedNameAttribute"></xref>類別，可指定替代名稱的型別、 欄位、 屬性、 方法或套用這個屬性的參數。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The alternate name for the type, field, property, method, or parameter to which this attribute is applied.
trans-unit.target: 型別、 欄位、 屬性、 方法或參數，這個屬性會套用替代名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the managed entity.
trans-unit.target: 取得受管理的實體名稱。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value Contains the name of the managed entity.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值包含受管理的實體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a T:System.String value containing the name of the managed entity.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含的受管理的實體名稱的 T:System.String 值。
